Looking for a suggestion?
Try sweet reds or see our top choices...

  • Similkameen Valley Region
Black Widow
Specializing in single vineyard, small lot releases, Black Widow Winery is ideally situated on the scenic Naramata Bench.
Blackwood Lane
We create excellent wines that are winning accolades and praise from wine lovers and connoisseurs all over.
Hidden Chapel
Ripened by the hot Okanagan sun and aged in our unique underground cellar. We believe our wines are blessed by the Hidden Chapel!
Corcelettes
Nestled in the beautiful Similkameen Valley, we use a mixture of old school tricks and new school twists to produce great wine.
